=== Team Information ===

The New York State Ubuntu Local Community Team is a group of '''volunteers''' and united by the operating system Ubuntu. The team is a decentralized team that empowers local groups to hold events. We provide a common hub to share ideas, resources and experiences.

As a team we also participate in global Ubuntu events such as User Days, Developer Week, and Bug Jams.

=== Getting Involved ===
Would you like to join the group?
* sign up at our <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-us-ny|official membership site]]</nowiki> using your launchpad ID. This ID is also used for Ubuntu One.
* sign up on our <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-ny|mailing list]]</nowiki> to share your thoughts and connect with others. 

==== Team Needs ====
* '''Event coordinator''' - coordinate events across the state
